name: Aquarium Simulator
description:
In this game you need to take care of your aquarium.
In the store you can buy fish and food for them.
Choose the design of the aquarium from the simplest to the most expensive.
Do not forget to feed the fish and clean the aquarium.
For good care, you get the reward of fish, for which you will be able to buy new fish and food.
To collect a reward or clean the aquarium you need to click on the object of your cursor.
When you turn off the game, your aquarium continues to live, you need to regularly go into the game to your aquarium was be live.
